          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy in food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie in der Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie en nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia no alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia in alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια στα τρόφιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía en alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar chart shows the amount of energy contained in bread, fruit cake, milk, boiled rice and egg.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bar graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiled rice and egg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bread</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fruit cake</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">milk</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt die Menge von Energie
enthalten im Brot, im Fruchtkuchen, in der Milch, in gekochtem Reis 
und im Ei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre la quantité 
d'énergie contenue en pain, gâteau de fruit, lait, riz bouilli et 
oeuf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de barra mostra a quantidade de 
energia contida no pão, no bolo da fruta, no leite, no arroz fervido 
e no ovo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma a colonna mostra la quantità di
energia contenuta in pane, torta della frutta, latte, riso bollito ed 
uovo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ιστόγραμμα εμφανίζει το ποσό ενέργειας που 
περιλαμβάνεται στο ψωμί, το κέικ φρούτων, το γάλα, το βρασμένα 
ρύζι και το αυγό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta carta de barra muestra la cantidad de 
energía contenida en pan, torta de la fruta, leche, arroz hervido y 
huevo.</string>
          </description>
